{"id":1274835202,"question_id":3436,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1717300146,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1274835202/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Subarray With Bitwise OR Closest to K","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumDifference(vector<int>& nums, int k) { //1 <= nums[i] <= 109 ; 1 <= k <= 109\n        int ans = 0;\n\n        if(nums.size()==1)\n            return abs(k-nums[0]);\n\n        vector<int> bitwiseAndI;\n        bitwiseAndI.push_back(nums[0]);\n        int temp=0;\n        for(int i=1; i<nums.size(); i++) {\n            temp = bitwiseAndI[i-1] & nums[i];\n            bitwiseAndI.push_back(temp);\n        };\n\n        \n        //int s=1;\n        //int e = nums.size()-1;\n        int bitwiseAnds = 0;\n        int bitwiseAnde = 0;\n        int bitwisese = 0;\n        int minDiff = k;\n        for(int s=1; s<nums.size()-1; s++) {\n            for(int e=s+1; e<nums.size(); e++) {\n                //bitwiseAnd i to j = bitwiseAndj & bitwiseAnd(i-1);\n                bitwiseAnds = bitwiseAndI[s-1];\n                bitwiseAnde = bitwiseAndI[e];\n                bitwisese =   bitwiseAnde - bitwiseAnds;\n                if(abs(bitwisese-k)<minDiff)\n                    minDiff = abs(bitwisese-k);\n            }\n        };\n\n        return minDiff;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-subarray-with-bitwise-or-closest-to-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
